original: bsam gtan khyad par can na rtog pa med par dpyod pa yod pas lhan cig dpyod pa med par dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par can na rtog pa med par dpyod pa yod pas lhan cig dpyod pa med par dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: Since there is investigation but no investigation accompanied by investigation in the special meditative stabilization, it is said:

original: rtog pa med par ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: rtog pa med par ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: There is no investigation without conception.

original: bsam gtan khyad par can na ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med pas rtog pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par can na ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med pas rtog pa med do //
translated: In the special meditative stabilization, there is no conception because there is no investigation accompanied by joy and pleasure.

original: de'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dpyod pa dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa ni rtog pa la mi 'khrul te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dpyod pa dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa ni rtog pa la mi 'khrul te /
translated: Therefore, investigation accompanied by joy and pleasure is not mistaken for conception.

original: me la du ba bzhin no //
analyzed: me la du ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like fire and smoke.

original: de dag gi skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag gi skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The arising of these has already been explained.

original: gzugs med khams na gnas med de //
analyzed: gzugs med khams na gnas med de //
translated: The formless realm has no place.

original: skye ba las ni de rnam bzhi //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba las ni de rnam bzhi // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Arising is of four kinds.üîΩThe formless realm has no place because there is no form in the formless realm.üîΩBecause there is no form that is a concomitant, it is said that there is no form in the formless realm.

original: rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because there is no meditative stabilization and uncontaminated vows, there is no form that is a concomitant.

original: rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is the one that differentiates‚Äù means it is the one that becomes free from attachment.

original: dben pa ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar @267b byed pa'i lam gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dben pa ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar @267b byed pa'i lam gang yin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is the one that is secluded‚Äù means it is the path that becomes free from attachment to the lower stage.

original: 'dis rnam par 'byed par byed pas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis rnam par 'byed par byed pas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the one that differentiates, it is called the path of differentiation.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it becomes free from attachment‚Äù means because it becomes turned away from.

original: cung zad ser ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar cung zad tsam ser ba la cung zad ser ba zhes bya ba de bzhin du gzugs cung zad cig yod pa yang gzugs med pa yin no //
analyzed: cung zad ser ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar cung zad tsam ser ba la cung zad ser ba zhes bya ba de bzhin du gzugs cung zad cig yod pa yang gzugs med pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a little yellow‚Äù means just as a little bit of yellow is called ‚Äúa little yellow,‚Äù so too, a little bit of form is called ‚Äúformless.‚Äù

original: de dag med na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag med na'o //
analyzed: de dag med na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag med na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf they do not exist, how can there be‚Ä¶‚Äù means if there is no body and speech.

original: de dag gis sdom par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lus dang dag gi sdom par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis sdom par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lus dang dag gi sdom par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú‚Ä¶a restraint of those?‚Äù means a restraint of body and speech.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na 'byung ba med par 'byung ba las gyur pa yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na 'byung ba med par 'byung ba las gyur pa yang mi rung ste /
translated: In the formless realm, it is not tenable that derivative form exists without primary elements.

original: 'byung ba la ltos pa med pa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba la ltos pa med pa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because derivative form does not occur without relying on primary elements.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúIt is like the uncontaminated vows,‚Äù

original: gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dper na zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag med bzhin du yang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs yod pa de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba
analyzed: gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dper na zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag med bzhin du yang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs yod pa de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba
translated: for example, uncontaminated vows exist as form derived from the primary elements, even though uncontaminated primary elements do not exist.

original: dag med bzhin du yang lus dang ngag gi sdom pa'i rang bzhin 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs gzugs med pa na spyod pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dag med bzhin du yang lus dang ngag gi sdom pa'i rang bzhin 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs gzugs med pa na spyod pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Similarly, even though contaminated primary elements do not exist, form derived from the primary elements that is the nature of the vows of body and speech would exist in the formless realm.üîΩThat is not so, because contaminated primary elements exist.

original: ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba med pa'i phyir la /
translated: The uncontaminated vows do not exist because uncontaminated primary elements do not exist.

original: khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir de'i 'byung ba dag rgyur byas nas 'byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir de'i 'byung ba dag rgyur byas nas 'byung ba yin gyi /
translated: Because it does not belong to the three realms, it is derived from the primary elements that are its cause.

original: 'byung ba la mi ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba la mi ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not independent of the primary elements.

original: de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams na lus dang ngag gi sdom pa gzhan gyi sa pa'i 'byung ba skal ba mi mnyam pa dag la brten nas mi 'byung la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams na lus dang ngag gi sdom pa gzhan gyi sa pa'i 'byung ba skal ba mi mnyam pa dag la brten nas mi 'byung la /
translated: Therefore, in the formless realm, the other body and speech vows do not arise in dependence on the primary elements of other levels, because they are of different types.

original: 'byung ba la mi ltos pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba la mi ltos pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But they are not independent of the primary elements.

original: de'i phyir rtog pa 'di ni med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa 'di ni med do //
translated: Therefore, this conception is nonexistent.

original: dpe dang dngos po la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe dang dngos po la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no similarity between the example and the fact.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do zhes bya ba ni gzugs med par snyom par 'jug pa la yang sdom pa skye ba med de ;
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do zhes bya ba ni gzugs med par snyom par 'jug pa la yang sdom pa skye ba med de ;
translated: It is also explained that vows do not arise in meditative attainment, because vows do not arise in meditative attainment of the formless realm,

original: 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there are no primary elements there.

original: gzhan gyis pa'i sdom pa ni 'byung ba gzhan rgyur byas nas 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis pa'i sdom pa ni 'byung ba gzhan rgyur byas nas 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that vows of other schools do not arise in dependence on the primary elements that are their cause.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das zhes 'byung bas de dgag par bshad de /üîΩde ltar na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa @268a * //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das zhes 'byung bas de dgag par bshad de / de ltar na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa @268a * //
translated: this passage explains the refutation of form.

original: la gzugs bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: la gzugs bkag pa yin no //
translated: Thus, form is refuted in the context of birth and meditative attainment.üîΩIf you ask, ‚ÄúBut do they have a body?‚Äù

original: 'on te lus kyang yod la zhes bya ba ni khog pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te lus kyang yod la zhes bya ba ni khog pa'o //
translated: it means do they have a torso.üîΩIf you ask, ‚ÄúBut do they have physical faculties?‚Äù

original: dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: it means do they have eyes and so on.üîΩIf you ask, ‚ÄúHow can they have some form?‚Äù

original: ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod ces bya ba ni gzugs mtha' dag yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod ces bya ba ni gzugs mtha' dag yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it means how can they have any form at all, since all form exists?

original: gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ci ste /
analyzed: gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ci ste /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBecause their size is small,‚Äù

original: gzugs mtha' dag yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: gzugs mtha' dag yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: then since all form does not exist,

original: gzugs cung zad yod pa zhes mi bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs cung zad yod pa zhes mi bya ste /
translated: it is not called ‚Äúsome form.‚Äù

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar 'dod na /
analyzed: bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that it is because their size is small,üîΩthen the text says,

original: chu'i skye bo zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: chu'i skye bo zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe beings of the water element‚Äù and so on.

original: chu'i skye bo ltar mi snang ba dag la yang gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu'i skye bo ltar mi snang ba dag la yang gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that those who are not visible, like water creatures, would also lack form.

original: gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ci ste gzugs dang ba'i phyir de dag gzugs cung zad yod pa yin gyi tshad chung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ci ste gzugs dang ba'i phyir de dag gzugs cung zad yod pa yin gyi tshad chung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: If you say that it is because it is clear, then if form exists in those realms because it is clear, not because it is subtle,

original: srid pa bar ma dang gzugs na spyod pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: srid pa bar ma dang gzugs na spyod pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: it follows that form exists in the intermediate existence and the form realm.

original: de dag ni dang pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ri dag la yang thogs pa med par 'gro bas de'i phyir de dag la yang gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni dang pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ri dag la yang thogs pa med par 'gro bas de'i phyir de dag la yang gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because they are clear, they are unimpeded by even vajra mountains. Therefore it follows that form does not exist in those realms.üîΩIt is because it is clearer than that.

original: gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs las gzugs na spyod pa dang la /
analyzed: gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs las gzugs na spyod pa dang la /
translated: Form in the desire realm is clearer than form in the form realm.

original: gzugs na spyod pa bas gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang ba yin zhing /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa bas gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang ba yin zhing /
translated: Form in the form realm is clearer than form in the formless realm.

original: de las ches dang ba gzhan med de //
analyzed: de las ches dang ba gzhan med de //
translated: There is no form that is clearer than that.

original: de'i phyir gzugs med pa de dag kho na yin gyi srid pa bar ma dang gzugs na spyod pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs med pa de dag kho na yin gyi srid pa bar ma dang gzugs na spyod pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore they are formless only, not intermediate beings or those who experience form.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur gyi /üîΩnam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa gsum ni ma yin te /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur gyi / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa gsum ni ma yin te /
translated: The summit of existence would be formless only.

original: de las gzhan pa gzugs ches dang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa gzugs ches dang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The three, the base of infinite space and so on, would not be formless because they are not formless compared to other states.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: Because birth is superior to meditative attainment.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ches shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbye bas gnas pa de bzhin du de dag gi skye ba'i khyad par yang gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos so //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ches shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbye bas gnas pa de bzhin du de dag gi skye ba'i khyad par yang gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos so //
translated: Just as meditative attainment of the base of infinite space and so on is classified as superior, so too their birth must definitely be classified as superior.

original: de'i phyir srid pa'i rtse mo'i gzugs kho na ches dang bas gzugs med pa yin par thal bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir srid pa'i rtse mo'i gzugs kho na ches dang bas gzugs med pa yin par thal bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore it follows that the form of the summit of existence is the most refined form and is formless.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa lhag ma gsum ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa lhag ma gsum ni ma yin no //
translated: But the remaining three, the base of infinite space and so on, are not.

original: ci ste gzugs med par skye ba'i gzugs @268b ni sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste gzugs med par skye ba'i gzugs @268b ni sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang ba nyid yin te /
translated: If you think that the form of those born in the formless realm is refined because it is not apprehended by the eye sense faculty of lower levels,

original: de'i phyir de dag kho na gzugs med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag kho na gzugs med pa yin gyi /
translated: then it follows that only those three are formless.

original: srid pa par ma la sogs pa dag ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: srid pa par ma la sogs pa dag ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: The intermediate realm and so on are not.

original: bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The form of those born in the absorptions is also like that.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dbang pos bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa nas de bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa'i dang pos bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i gzugs mi 'dzin pa'i bar du yin te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dbang pos bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa nas de bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa'i dang pos bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i gzugs mi 'dzin pa'i bar du yin te /
translated: The sense faculties of the first absorption do not apprehend the form of the second absorption and so on and so too the sense faculties of the third absorption do not apprehend the form of the fourth absorption.

original: sa gong ma pa'i gzugs ches dang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i gzugs ches dang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the form of higher levels is more refined.

original: de ltar gyur na gang las de dag gzugs med pa zhes bya ba'i gzugs na spyod pa dag ma yin par 'gyur ba de dang khyad par ci zhig yod //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gang las de dag gzugs med pa zhes bya ba'i gzugs na spyod pa dag ma yin par 'gyur ba de dang khyad par ci zhig yod //
translated: If that were so, what would be the difference between the formless realm and the form realm, since both would be called formless?

original: gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams te /
analyzed: gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams te /
translated: If you say that the names of the two realms are consistent with their objects,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams yin la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams yin la /
translated: the desire realm is distinguished by the objects of desire.

original: gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs kyi khams yin no //üîΩgzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs kyi khams yin no // gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: The form realm is distinguished by form.üîΩThe formless realm is not distinguished by form,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: so the name of the formless realm is not consistent with its object.

original: 'dod rgyal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is arbitrary,

original: de la rigs pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de la rigs pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba la /
translated: what logic is there in that?

original: rigs pa ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: rigs pa ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: Logic is valid knowledge.

original: de yang rjes su dpag pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rjes su dpag pa yin te /
translated: That is inference.

original: gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin te /
translated: The names of the two realms are consistent with their objects.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la'o //
translated: It is not the formless realm.

original: 'dod pa de ni lung ngam de ste rjes su dpag pa las rtogs na /
analyzed: 'dod pa de ni lung ngam de ste rjes su dpag pa las rtogs na /
translated: If you understand desire through scripture or inference,üîΩyou do not see any inference that form exists in the formless realm, and if you hold the scriptures to be valid,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs yod pa nyid la rjes su dpag pa ma mthong zhing lung yongs su 'dzin pa ni gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs yod pa nyid la rjes su dpag pa ma mthong zhing lung yongs su 'dzin pa ni gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: the sutra that states ‚Äúif life and heat are inseparable‚Äù explains that

original: mdo las tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che tshe gang yin pa dang / drod gang yin pa'i chos 'di dag ni 'dres pa yin no zhes gsungs te //
analyzed: mdo las tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che tshe gang yin pa dang / drod gang yin pa'i chos 'di dag ni 'dres pa yin no zhes gsungs te //
translated: the sutra states, ‚ÄúVenerable MahƒÅkau·π£·π≠hila, life and heat are inseparable phenomena.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir de na tshe yod dang drod kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de na tshe yod dang drod kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore life exists there and heat also exists there.üîΩTwo pieces of lotus leaf

original: 'dam bu'i shog gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dam bu'i shog gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: mdo las tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dper na 'dam bu'i shog gnyis gnam du 'greng bar 'gyur la de gnyis phan tshun bsten cing phan tshun bsten nas 'dug pa de las 'ga' zhig gis cig shos bsal @269a * //üîΩna cig shos 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdo las tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dper na 'dam bu'i shog gnyis gnam du 'greng bar 'gyur la de gnyis phan tshun bsten cing phan tshun bsten nas 'dug pa de las 'ga' zhig gis cig shos bsal @269a * // na cig shos 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one bundle were pulled from one side, the other would fall.

original: gnyis pa bsal na cig shos 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa bsal na cig shos 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the other bundle were pulled from the other side, the first would fall.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du ming dang gzugs rnams kyang phan tshun bsten cing bsten nas gnas zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //üîΩming yod pas gdon mi za bar gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du ming dang gzugs rnams kyang phan tshun bsten cing bsten nas gnas zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin no // ming yod pas gdon mi za bar gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod par 'gyur te /
translated: Venerable Sariputra, in the same way, name and form are mutually dependent and persist by mutual dependence.üîΩIf name exists, form is not nonexistent.

original: gzugs la ltos pa med par ming 'ba' zhig gnas pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs la ltos pa med par ming 'ba' zhig gnas pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: If form exists, name is not nonexistent.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs so //
translated: The Pratityasamutpada Sutra declares: Name and form are conditioned by consciousness.

original: de la gzugs med par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la rnam par shes pa dang / de'i rkyen gyis ming yin la /
analyzed: de la gzugs med par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la rnam par shes pa dang / de'i rkyen gyis ming yin la /
translated: In the moment of linking with the formless realm, consciousness and name arise due to its conditions.

original: de yang gdon mi za bar lhan cig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang gdon mi za bar lhan cig par 'gyur te /
translated: And they definitely occur simultaneously,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'du byed kyi bar las gzhan du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // 'du byed kyi bar las gzhan du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung la /
translated: because it says, ‚ÄúName and form arise due to the condition of consciousness.‚ÄùüîΩThe s≈´tra states:

original: mdo las dge slong dag rnam par shes pa gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba /
analyzed: mdo las dge slong dag rnam par shes pa gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba /
translated: Monks, consciousness that approaches form,

original: gzugs la dmigs pa /
analyzed: gzugs la dmigs pa /
translated: that focuses on form,

original: gzugs la brten pa gnas so zhes rgyas par 'byung zhing /
analyzed: gzugs la brten pa gnas so zhes rgyas par 'byung zhing /
translated: that is supported by form, and that is based on form exists.

original: dge slong dag gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag ni gzugs las gzhan dang / tshor ba las gzhan dang / 'du shes las gzhan dang / 'du byed las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'gro ba 'am /
analyzed: dge slong dag gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag ni gzugs las gzhan dang / tshor ba las gzhan dang / 'du shes las gzhan dang / 'du byed las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'gro ba 'am /
translated: Monks, if someone says, ‚ÄúI go to another place from form, from feeling, from discrimination, and from formation,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI go to another place from consciousness,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI go to another place from the aggregates, elements, or sense bases,‚Äù that person would be speaking incorrectly.

original: 'ong ba 'am skye bar smra'o zhes zer na de'i ngag de ni tshig tsam du zad do zhes rgyas par gsungs te /
analyzed: 'ong ba 'am skye bar smra'o zhes zer na de'i ngag de ni tshig tsam du zad do zhes rgyas par gsungs te /
translated: If you say that form arises or is born there, that is mere verbiage.

original: lung de las kyang gzugs med pa dag tu gzugs mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: lung de las kyang gzugs med pa dag tu gzugs mi 'grub ste /
translated: This passage also shows that form is not established in the formless realm.

original: lung nyid dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung nyid dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the scriptures themselves are to be analyzed.

original: 'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa las so //
analyzed: 'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa las so //
translated: Or from all, means from the desire, form and formless realms.

original: 'dir dgongs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intended meaning here is this.

original: tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis //üîΩgang tshe lus 'di 'dod byed cing //
analyzed: tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis // gang tshe lus 'di 'dod byed cing //
translated: Life, heat and consciousnessüîΩwhen this body is discarded

original: bor nas de tshe 'dug pa ni //
analyzed: bor nas de tshe 'dug pa ni //
translated: and they abandon this body,

original: sems med ji ltar shing bzhin no //
analyzed: sems med ji ltar shing bzhin no //
translated: it remains like a senseless log.

original: zhes 'byung bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i tshe kho na la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i tshe kho na la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is stated with reference to life in the desire realm alone.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni lus kyang med na lus 'jig pa lta ga la zhig yod /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni lus kyang med na lus 'jig pa lta ga la zhig yod /
translated: But if there is no body in the formless realm, how could the body be destroyed there?

original: gzugs kyi khams na ni gzugs yod mod kyi /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams na ni gzugs yod mod kyi /
translated: In the form realm, form does exist.

original: lus 'jig par mngon pa ni med do //
analyzed: lus 'jig par mngon pa ni med do //
translated: But it is not evident that the body is destroyed.

original: gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun bsten pa @269b nyid du gsungs pa yang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa kho na las dgongs nas gsungs so zhes bya bar mngon te /
analyzed: gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun bsten pa @269b nyid du gsungs pa yang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa kho na las dgongs nas gsungs so zhes bya bar mngon te /
translated: And the statement that name-and-form are mutually dependent is also made with reference to the realm of desire and the realm of form, because

original: gnyi ga yod na phan tshun bsten pa nyid srid na /
analyzed: gnyi ga yod na phan tshun bsten pa nyid srid na /
translated: mutual dependence is possible only when both exist.

original: gzugs med pa na ni sems dang sems las byung ba kho na phan tshun bsten te gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs 'di la rkyen rnam par shes pa yod pas na 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na ni sems dang sems las byung ba kho na phan tshun bsten te gzugs med pa'i phyir ro // gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs 'di la rkyen rnam par shes pa yod pas na 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te /
translated: In the formless realm, mind and mental factors are mutually dependent, because there is no form.üîΩAs for the statement, ‚ÄúName-and-form have consciousness as their condition,‚Äù name-and-form have consciousness as their condition, because consciousness is the condition of name-and-form.

original: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ming kho na'i rkyen yin gyi gzugs kyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ming kho na'i rkyen yin gyi gzugs kyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: This is because the consciousness that occurs in the formless realm is the condition of name only, not of form.

original: rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dgag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten snga ma nas srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis 'dir skye ba ni 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dgag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten snga ma nas srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis 'dir skye ba ni 'ong ba'o //
translated: The refutation of the coming and going of consciousness is as follows: Coming is the birth of a being here from a previous world by means of the continuum of the intermediate existence.

original: de bzhin du 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du skye ba ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du skye ba ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: Going is the birth from here into a subsequent world.

original: ci de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: ci de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams so //
translated: Do all of them come and go?

original: de bkag ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag pa'o //
analyzed: de bkag ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag pa'o //
translated: The refutation of that is the refutation of the coming and going of consciousness.

original: 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig go //
analyzed: 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig go //
translated: Or does any of them come and go?

original: kho bo cag ni de thams cad med na de bkag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni de thams cad med na de bkag pa yin gyi /
translated: We refute all of them, and we refute the coming and going of consciousness.
